ROOT.GetEffectStation: select DISTINCT ID,WARNLEVEL from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_ALARM_WEATHER_STATION WHERE warntype={0} and warntime={1}
ROOT.GetEffectLine: SELECT LINEID,NUM,WARNLEVEL FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_ALARM_WEATHER_TOWER WHERE warntype={0} and warntime={1} ORDER BY LINEID,WARNLEVEL,NUM
